channel.title: No Shop Background
channel.description:
This might have to do with the client, but i made a server and it has iceman client, and when i go to buy from a shop you see the items, and the game screen, not a brown square, so i guess it's see-through.
kind of hard to explain, hope you understand.
please help.

item.title: No Shop Background
item.dc:creator: @southpaw63 southpaw63
item.description:
@southpaw63 wrote:

thats what i was thinking. is there supposed to be a .png file for shop background?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2009, 06:12:22 pm[/size][hr][quote=“klorox, post:2, topic:261333”]It’s the client I’m pretty sure. Try another client* and tell me what it does.[/quote]

i used another client, and it had a shop background. not to mention a bunch of nulls too.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2009, 08:26:35 pm[/size][hr]Anyone help me?

Read full topic
